author: Nerdstalgic
description:
Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul have given fans some of the most unforgettable villains in TV history—Tuco Salamanca, Todd Alquist, and the cold-blooded Gus Fring. But no one quite prepared us for the arrival of Lalo Salamanca. Introduced in Better Call Saul, Lalo is the perfect storm of charm, intelligence, and unrelenting danger.  

Lalo Salamanca isn’t just evil—he’s charismatic, calculated, and completely unhinged. Was he the greatest villain Vince Gilligan ever created?

#breakingbad #bettercallsaul #lalosalamanca #gusfring #walterwhite
title: The ONE Breaking Bad Villain More Evil Than Gus Fring
